name: Bubba's Big Buff Adventure
description:
Gameplay Bubba’s Big Buff Adventure is a 2D Platformer where you play as an abnormally large buff pug named Bubba, adventuring through the forest of Akasia searching for materials to build your communities new dog village, and defeating many enemies of the Cat Kingdom! __________________________________________________ Features
  • Adventure through the forest of Akasia
  • Free your Community of Dogs from the captivity of the Cats
  • Defeat Cats from the enemy Cat Kingdom
  • Collect Resources and Materials for your new Dog Village
  • And Defeat Humphrey the Cat Boss!
__________________________________________________ Controls
  • WASD  - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Punch / Attack
  • W / Space - Jump  and Double Jump / Next Page
  • T - Menu
  • G - Respawn
__________________________________________________ Credits
  • Moss Valencia - Character, Enemy, Items, Backgrounds, and Cutscene Art / Animations
  • Nathan Richmond - Player Mechanics and Collectibles Programmer / Level Designer

  • Joseph Strzelec - Boss Fight / Music & SFX Implementer
  • Ethan McPeek - Attack & Movement Art / Parallax
